# Damnation Stride
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Teleportation Spells|teleportation]]) \[[[Fire Spells|fire]]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[4th Level Summoner Spells|Summoner 4]],  [[5th Level Witch Spells|Witch 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 9th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 9]]

**Casting Time** 1 standard action

**Components:** V

**Range:** Long (400 ft. + 40 ft./level)

**Target:** Self and creatures within a 10-foot-radius burst (see below)

**Duration:** 1 minutes/level

**Saving Throw:** Reflex half, see text

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Advanced Race Guide, pg. 173

This spell functions like *[[Dimension Door (Spell)|dimension door]]*, except you leave behind a burst of fire. Choose one corner of your starting square. A 10-foot-radius burst of flame explodes from that corner the moment you leave, dealing 4d6 points of fire damage (Reflex negates).
